summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4221 for the improvement of 57th Avenue South, from Orcas Street to Hudson Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50110, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
